pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 7, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, March 7, 2018:

Toronto, Ontario

11 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Rotman Initiative for Women in Business International Women’s Day event. He will deliver remarks and participate in an armchair discussion with the Executive Director of Catalyst Canada, Tanya van Biesen.

Desautels Hall, 2nd floor
Rotman School of Management
105 St George Street

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.
  • Open coverage

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Employment Services Centre of WoodGreen Community Services and deliver remarks to highlight Budget 2018’s Canada Workers Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Employment Services Centre
WoodGreen Community Services
‎989 Danforth Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.
  • Photo opportunity of the visit
  • Open coverage of the media availability
